p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_80: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Our program is a categorical 5-year program, including an internship at Ochsner. We have a high volume of case material over a broad range of primary and specialized tertiary care pathology. Residents also receive extensive procedural experience in our busy tertiary level IR section. We offer ESIR pathway for residents interested in IR and a pathway to dual certification in DR and NM. Approximately 95% of our graduates have entered competitive fellowships.

p_347: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
